acceptJesus.title: Accept Jesus
acceptJesus.subtitle: Make a commitment to follow Christ
acceptJesus.prayerSubtitle: Read this prayer aloud or in your heart
acceptJesus.confirmPrayer: I have read and prayed this prayer from my heart
acceptJesus.successText: Heaven is rejoicing! Our pastoral team will contact you soon to help you grow in your faith.
acceptJesus.nextStep1: Our team will contact you within 24-48 hours
acceptJesus.defaultPrayer: Lord Jesus, I believe You are the Son of God who died for my sins. I confess that I am a sinner and I need Your forgiveness. I repent of my sins and turn away from them. I invite You into my heart as my Lord and Savior. Thank You for Your gift of eternal life. Help me to live for You all the days of my life. In Jesus name, Amen.
